postSQLs:[("UPDATE STAG.CLIENT_LOAD SET ALT_CLIENT_NM = CAST( RTRIM(REPLACE(REPLACE(ALT_CLIENT_NM,X'E38080',' '),X'EFBFBD',' ')) AS VARCHAR(62))\nWHERE '" + $p_IPPF_RULES_GEO_NAME + "' = 'JP'")],
